New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 11 月 11 日星期一 14:12:21 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Sultan of Brunei’s extravagant ‘floating palace’ touches down in Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sultan-of-bruneis-extravagant-floating-palace-touches-down-in-auckland/OVV3XJEVKRHL3IKR2H6QY4ATDQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sultan-of-bruneis-extravagant-floating-palace-touches-down-in-auckland/OVV3XJEVKRHL3IKR2H6QY4ATDQ/ Flight radars showed the luxury jet landed in Auckland this afternoon. Mon, 11 Nov 2024 07:47:23 +0000 The Boeing 747 Jumbo Jet V8-BKH owned by the Sultan of Brunei (inset) is widely considered to be one of the most extravagant aircraft in the world. Photo / Kevin Hacket
Fired Tauranga vet wins $35k after taking clinic to Employment Relations Authority https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fired-tauranga-vet-wins-35k-after-takeing-clinic-to-employment-relations-authority/ANTZ7GEIIFD57KS63AAAYEQMUE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fired-tauranga-vet-wins-35k-after-takeing-clinic-to-employment-relations-authority/ANTZ7GEIIFD57KS63AAAYEQMUE/ Jeremy WilkinsonTony Austwick was unjustifiably dismissed after three customers made complaints about him. Mon, 11 Nov 2024 07:26:09 +0000 Dr Tony Austwick took his former to the ERA after he was fired following a series of customer complaints. Photo / Alex Cairns
Government flags to fly at half-mast to mark burial of WWII veteran Sir Robert Gillies https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/government-flags-to-fly-at-half-mast-to-mark-burial-of-wwii-veteran-sir-robert-gillies/KIDWZQYICJEWNK6TYVLHKT32JM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/government-flags-to-fly-at-half-mast-to-mark-burial-of-wwii-veteran-sir-robert-gillies/KIDWZQYICJEWNK6TYVLHKT32JM/ All government and public buildings will fly the New Zealand flag at half-mast on Tuesday. Mon, 11 Nov 2024 07:18:38 +0000 Sir Robert "Bom" Gillies was the last remaining member of the Māori Battalion B-company. He died on November 7. Photo / Andrew Warner
Hīkoi supporters urged to be beware of scam targeting the group marching over Treaty Principles Bill https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hikoi-supporters-urged-to-be-beware-of-scam-targeting-the-group-marching-over-treaty-principles-bill/GAGENGACSRGGLBY7OB3DOCODSE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hikoi-supporters-urged-to-be-beware-of-scam-targeting-the-group-marching-over-treaty-principles-bill/GAGENGACSRGGLBY7OB3DOCODSE/ The scam demands koha in order to connect to a 'livestream' of the hīkoi. Mon, 11 Nov 2024 07:12:14 +0000 Organisers want a peaceful hīkoi to Parliament. Photo / File
Porirua police ask locals to check yards for missing man Graham Russell Smith https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/porirua-police-ask-locals-to-check-yards-for-missing-man-graham-russell-smith/BM7R45UUJJHGXDSSOFGRBIMITI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/porirua-police-ask-locals-to-check-yards-for-missing-man-graham-russell-smith/BM7R45UUJJHGXDSSOFGRBIMITI/ Graham Russell Smith has been missing since early Sunday evening.Mon, 11 Nov 2024 06:27:04 +0000 Police are continuing the search for 77-year-old Graham Russell Smith, who has been missing since early evening on Sunday, November 10. Photo / Police
Northland youth suicides: Coroner hears troubled life of 12-year-old James Murray https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-youth-suicides-coroner-hears-troubled-life-of-12-year-old-james-murray/BZIVRHE75NA4XM6HM5ITAI3PYI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-youth-suicides-coroner-hears-troubled-life-of-12-year-old-james-murray/BZIVRHE75NA4XM6HM5ITAI3PYI/ Shannon PitmanBoy's death is one of six suspected youth suicides the coroner is examining in Whangārei. Two seriously injured in two-vehicle crash in Manawatū, road blocked https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/two-seriously-injured-in-two-vehicle-crash-in-manawatu-road-blocked/UVBFA6HIENHJPHMU64GIBSHO3I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/two-seriously-injured-in-two-vehicle-crash-in-manawatu-road-blocked/UVBFA6HIENHJPHMU64GIBSHO3I/ Katie OliverThe road is blocked and will remain shut for some time, police say. Auckland police investigating after Beach Haven kitten’s tail ‘ripped off’, threatening note left https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-police-investigating-after-beach-haven-kittens-tail-ripped-off-throne-note-left/ENMTJTYVEFB6HOUQIW5YQJL6ZE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-police-investigating-after-beach-haven-kittens-tail-ripped-off-throne-note-left/ENMTJTYVEFB6HOUQIW5YQJL6ZE/ Nazahryth Bernard'If they can hurt a cat like that ... they could hurt anyone.' Joel Buckley inquest: Firearms boss not made aware of colleague’s alarming concerns that Buckley ‘very capable of harming people’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/joel-buckley-inquest-firearms-boss-not-made-aware-of-colleagues-alarming-concerns-that-buckley-very-capable-of-harming-人/QZT4ZFJY3JFKNOVTQIIAWQHKPI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/joel-buckley-inquest-firearms-boss-not-made-aware-of-colleagues-alarming-concerns-that-buckley-very-capable-of-harming-人/QZT4ZFJY3JFKNOVTQIIAWQHKPI/ Belinda FeekJoel Buckley was later killed by AOS after firing at officers when they visited his home.
